ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act
PrecisREGULATION AMENDING THE EXCLUSION LIST REGULATIONS, 2007 by reducing the number of unnecessary environmental assessments by broadening the scope of exemptions under the Exclusion List Regulations, 2007 to include certain projects undertaken by the Canada Post Corporation that have little of no effect on the environment and by improving the quality and clarity of the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0259 Publication Date: 2008-09-17
